abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that deploys a damaging field of fire.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.description: Target a nearby location to call in a Stim Beacon, granting all players in its radius rapid fire.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.description: Use your map to call in orbital deployment smokescreens that obscure vision.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.description: Use your map to target a location, launching a devastating orbital strike.

keyRelationships.name: Tariq Porter
keyRelationships.impact: Motivated Brimstone's commitment to team and duty

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Unity through adaptability and teamwork
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Reorganized protocol after the Venice mission failure

conflicts.name: Landfall Project
conflicts.actionTaken: Led a mission to shut it down

story.orbitalArsenal: Used for battlefield control and team support
story.summary: Brimstone is a battle-hardened leader shaped by loss, loyalty, and a lifelong dedication to protecting others. His tactical mind and unwavering integrity make him a cornerstone of the VALORANT Protocol.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.description: EQUIP a chemical launcher. FIRE to launch a canister that shatters upon hitting the floor, creating a lingering chemical zone that damages and applies Vulnerable to enemies.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: EQUIP a gas emitter. FIRE to throw the emitter that perpetually remains throughout the round. RE-USE the ability to create a toxic gas cloud at the cost of fuel. This ability can be picked up to be redeployed.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.description: EQUIP a gas emitter launcher. FIRE to deploy a long line of gas emitters. RE-USE the ability to create a tall wall of toxic gas at the cost of fuel.

abilities.name: Viper's Pit
abilities.description: EQUIP a chemical sprayer. FIRE to spray a massive cloud in all directions around Viper, creating a large cloud that reduces the vision range and maximum health of enemies inside of it.

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Shared leadership responsibilities and strategic planning

keyRelationships.name: Omen
keyRelationships.impact: Unclear past connection, maintains distance

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Precision and control through chemical warfare
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Defended an entire district during a Radivore invasion

conflicts.name: Toxic Crisis
conflicts.threat: Toxic gas leak caused by Kingdom Corporation experiments
conflicts.actionTaken: Designed a system to contain and eliminate the toxic gas leak

duties: Uses chemical warfare tactics to control enemies

story.toxicArsenal: Uses chemical-based weapons to disorient and eliminate enemies
story.summary: Viper is a brilliant and calculated strategist, using her expertise in toxic warfare to control the battlefield and protect her team from the shadows.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.description: EQUIP a shadow walk ability and see its range indicator. FIRE to begin a brief channel, then teleport to the marked location.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: INSTANTLY fire a shadow projectile forward, briefly reducing the vision range of all players it touches. This projectile can pass straight through walls.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.description: EQUIP a shadow orb and see its range indicator. FIRE to throw the shadow orb to the marked location, creating a long-lasting shadow sphere that blocks vision. HOLD ALTERNATE FIRE while targeting to move the marker further away. HOLD the ability key while targeting to move the marker closer.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to begin teleporting to the selected location. While teleporting, Omen will appear as a Shade that can be destroyed by an enemy to cancel his teleport, or PRESS EQUIP for Omen to cancel his teleport.

keyRelationships.name: Viper
keyRelationships.impact: Unclear past connection, maintains distance

keyRelationships.name: Sage
keyRelationships.impact: Sage provides emotional grounding for Omen's fractured identity

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Stealth and manipulation through shadow tactics
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Led a covert operation to disrupt enemy supply lines during a Radiant uprising

conflicts.name: Shadow Incident
conflicts.actionTaken: Survived a transformation that fragmented his identity

duties: Deploys smokes to obscure enemy vision

story.shadowAbilities: Manipulates shadows and Radianite energy to disorient and outmaneuver enemies
story.summary: Omen is an enigmatic figure whose mastery of shadows and stealth makes him a formidable controller, weaving through the battlefield to disrupt and dominate.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.description: EQUIP a Nanoswarm grenade. FIRE to throw the grenade. Upon landing, the Nanoswarm goes covert. ACTIVATE the Nanoswarm to deploy a damaging swarm of nanobots.

abilities.name: Alarmbot
abilities.description: EQUIP a covert Alarmbot. FIRE to deploy a bot that hunts down enemies that get in range. After reaching its target, the bot explodes, applying Vulnerable. HOLD EQUIP to recall a deployed bot.

abilities.name: Turret
abilities.description: EQUIP a Turret. FIRE to deploy a turret that fires at enemies in a 180 degree cone. HOLD EQUIP to recall the deployed turret.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.description: EQUIP the Lockdown device. FIRE to deploy the device. After a long windup, the device detains all enemies caught in the radius. The device can be destroyed by enemies.

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Provides technological expertise to support Brimstone’s leadership

keyRelationships.name: Raze
keyRelationships.impact: Collaborates on tech projects but clashes over reckless vs. methodical approaches

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Innovative and analytical, focusing on defensive tech solutions
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Developed a prototype defense system to protect a VALORANT Protocol safehouse from a Radiant assault

conflicts.name: Tech Sabotage
conflicts.actionTaken: Deployed countermeasures and reinforced facility defenses with custom tech

duties: Deploys turrets and alarmbots for site defense

story.techArsenal: Employs advanced robotics and nanotechnology to lock down areas and protect allies
story.summary: Killjoy is a brilliant inventor whose cutting-edge technology fortifies defenses and controls the battlefield with precision and ingenuity.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.description: Place a stealthed tripwire between two walls, triggering and restraining enemies who cross it.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.description: Place a remote activation trap that creates a cage that blocks vision and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.description: Place a remote camera that you can activate to view its video feed.

abilities.name: Neural Theft
abilities.description: Extract information from a dead enemy, revealing the location of their living allies.

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Provides critical intel to support Brimstone’s strategies

keyRelationships.name: Killjoy
keyRelationships.impact: Shares expertise in surveillance tech development

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Methodical and secretive, focusing on information control
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Single-handedly uncovered a black-market Radianite trafficking ring

conflicts.name: Shadow Market Bust
conflicts.actionTaken: Infiltrated network using surveillance tech to dismantle operations

duties: Deploys traps to secure key areas
Gathers intel to expose enemy positions

story.surveillanceArsenal: Utilizes advanced surveillance gadgets to monitor and trap enemies, controlling information flow
story.summary: Cypher is a master of surveillance whose network of traps and cameras ensures no enemy movement goes unnoticed, securing the battlefield through information dominance.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.description: Fire an explosive bolt that emits a damaging pulse of static energy.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.description: Deploy a drone that can be piloted and fires a dart that reveals enemies.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.description: Fire a bolt that deploys a sonar emitter, revealing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Hunter's Fury
abilities.description: Fire up to three deadly energy blasts that spear across the entire map.

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Provides reconnaissance to support Brimstone’s tactical decisions

keyRelationships.name: Sage
keyRelationships.impact: Shares a bond of mutual respect and teamwork

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Calm and precise, leading through action and reliability
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Tracked a rogue Radiant operative across Siberia, preventing a Radianite weapon prototype theft

conflicts.name: Siberian Pursuit
conflicts.actionTaken: Led a solo mission to track and apprehend the operative

duties: Uses recon tools to reveal enemy positions
Engages enemies with precise, long-range attacks

story.reconArsenal: Employs advanced tracking and archery-based tools to locate and expose enemies
story.summary: Sova is a relentless scout whose keen instincts and precise tools uncover enemy positions, paving the way for his team’s success.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a barrier orb. FIRE places a solid wall that fortifies after a few seconds. ALT FIRE rotates the targeter.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a slowing orb. FIRE to throw a slowing orb forward that detonates upon landing, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a healing orb. FIRE with your crosshairs over a damaged ally to activate a heal-over-time on them. ALT FIRE while Sage is damaged to activate a self heal-over-time.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: EQUIP a resurrection ability. FIRE with your crosshairs placed over a dead ally to begin resurrecting them. After a brief channel, the ally will be brought back to life with full health.

keyRelationships.name: Sova
keyRelationships.impact: Shares a bond of mutual respect and teamwork

keyRelationships.name: Omen
keyRelationships.impact: Provides emotional grounding for Omen’s fractured identity

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Compassionate and supportive, prioritizing team survival
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Restored a critical VALORANT Protocol outpost after a devastating Radiant attack

conflicts.name: Monastery Siege
conflicts.threat: Radiant extremist attack on a Radianite research site
conflicts.actionTaken: Led evacuation and healed wounded while fortifying defenses

story.healingArsenal: Harnesses Radiant energy to heal allies, revive the fallen, and fortify defenses
story.summary: Sage is a compassionate healer whose Radiant abilities restore and protect her team, anchoring the battlefield with hope and resilience.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: EQUIP a flame wall. FIRE to create a line of flame that moves forward, creating a wall of fire that blocks vision and damages players passing through it. HOLD FIRE to bend the wall in the direction of your crosshair.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.description: EQUIP a fireball. FIRE to throw a fireball that explodes after a set amount of time or upon hitting the ground, creating a lingering fire zone that damages enemies. The fire zone heals Phoenix instead of dealing damage.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.description: EQUIP a flare orb that takes a curving path and detonates shortly after throwing. FIRE to curve the flare orb to the left, detonating and blinding any player who sees the orb. ALTERNATE FIRE to curve the flare orb to the right.

abilities.name: Run It Back
abilities.description: INSTANTLY place a marker at Phoenix's location. While this ability is active, dying or allowing the timer to expire will end this ability and bring Phoenix back to this location with full health.

keyRelationships.name: Jett
keyRelationships.impact: Competes in flair and agility but shares mutual respect

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Guides Phoenix’s raw talent into disciplined action

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Bold and charismatic, leading by example
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Single-handedly cleared a Radianite smuggling outpost with his fiery abilities

conflicts.name: London Blaze
conflicts.actionTaken: Infiltrated and dismantled the operation using fire-based tactics

duties: Leads aggressive pushes with flame walls and flashes
Controls space with fiery area denial
Sustains himself through healing and revival

story.fireArsenal: Wields Radiant fire to dominate the battlefield with aggressive, self-sustaining tactics
story.summary: Phoenix is a fiery duelist whose radiant flames and fearless attitude ignite the battlefield, leading his team with boldness and flair.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud on impact with a surface. HOLD the ability key to curve the smoke in the direction of your crosshair.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: INSTANTLY propel Jett high into the air.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: ACTIVATE to prepare a gust of wind for a limited time. RE-USE the wind to propel Jett in the direction she is moving. If Jett is standing still, she propels forward.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: EQUIP a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an opponent. FIRE to throw a single knife at your target. ALTERNATE FIRE to throw all remaining daggers at your target.

keyRelationships.name: Phoenix
keyRelationships.impact: Competes in flair and agility but shares mutual respect

keyRelationships.name: Neon
keyRelationships.impact: Bonds over shared speed and cultural ties

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Independent and agile, thriving in high-pressure situations
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Outmaneuvered an enemy convoy to secure a Radianite shipment in Seoul

conflicts.name: Seoul Storm
conflicts.threat: Radianite heist by a rogue faction
conflicts.actionTaken: Used speed and precision to disrupt the heist and secure the shipment

duties: Eliminates enemies with precise knife throws

story.windArsenal: Harnesses Radiant wind to outmaneuver enemies with unmatched speed and precision
story.summary: Jett is a lightning-fast duelist whose wind-powered agility and deadly accuracy carve through the battlefield, outpacing and outwitting her foes.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.description: EQUIP an ethereal, destructible eye. ACTIVATE to cast the eye a short distance forward. The eye will Nearsight all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: INSTANTLY consume a nearby Soul Orb, rapidly healing for a short duration. Health gained through this skill exceeding 100 will decay over time. If Empress is active, this skill will automatically cast and not consume the orb.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.description: INSTANTLY consume a nearby Soul Orb, becoming intangible for a short duration. If Empress is active, also become invisible.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.description: INSTANTLY enter a frenzy, increasing firing, equip, and reload speed dramatically. Gain infinite charges of Soul Harvest abilities.

keyRelationships.name: Viper
keyRelationships.impact: Clashes over differing methods but cooperates for mutual goals

keyRelationships.name: Sage
keyRelationships.impact: Values Sage’s healing to sustain her aggressive playstyle

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Ruthless and independent, thriving on personal dominance
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Decimated an enemy stronghold single-handedly to protect a Radianite cache

conflicts.name: Mexico City Rampage
conflicts.actionTaken: Infiltrated and eliminated the cartel using soul-based abilities

duties: Sustains herself through soul-based healing and intangibility
Dominates fights with aggressive, high-damage tactics

story.soulArsenal: Harnesses Radiant soul energy to heal, evade, and overwhelm enemies with relentless aggression
story.summary: Reyna is a ferocious duelist whose soul-stealing powers fuel her dominance, thriving on kills to sustain and overpower her enemies.

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.description: EQUIP a Boom Bot. FIRE to deploy the bot, causing it to travel in a straight line on the ground, bouncing off walls. The Boom Bot locks onto any enemies in its frontal cone and chases them, exploding for heavy damage if it reaches them.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw a Blast Pack that sticks to surfaces. RE-USE the ability after deployment to detonate, damaging and moving anything hit. Raze isn't damaged by this ability but can use it for mobility.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.description: EQUIP a cluster grenade. FIRE to throw the grenade, which deals damage and creates sub-munitions, each dealing damage to anyone in their range. The ability refreshes after two kills.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.description: EQUIP a rocket launcher. FIRE to shoot a rocket that deals massive area damage on contact with anything.

keyRelationships.name: Killjoy
keyRelationships.impact: Collaborates on tech but clashes over reckless vs. methodical approaches

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Channels her chaotic energy under Brimstone’s guidance

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Chaotic and bold, disrupting enemies with explosive flair
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Demolished a fortified enemy base to secure a critical Radianite shipment

conflicts.name: Salvador Siege
conflicts.actionTaken: Used explosives to breach defenses and neutralize the threat

duties: Clears areas with grenades and rockets
Gains mobility through blast pack propulsion

story.explosiveArsenal: Deploys a devastating array of explosives to obliterate enemies and control the battlefield
story.summary: Raze is an explosive duelist whose high-energy demolitions and vibrant personality bring chaos to the battlefield, blasting through enemies with unrelenting force.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: EQUIP a fusion charge. FIRE to set a slow-charging burst through a wall, dealing heavy damage to anyone caught in its area.

abilities.name: Flashpoint
abilities.description: EQUIP a blinding charge. FIRE to set a fast-acting burst through a wall, blinding all players looking at it.

abilities.name: Fault Line
abilities.description: EQUIP a seismic blast. HOLD FIRE to increase the distance, then release to set off a quake that dazes all players in its zone and in a line up to the targeted point.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: EQUIP a seismic charge. FIRE to send a cascading quake through all terrain in a large cone, dazing and knocking up all players caught in its blast.

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Works under Brimstone’s command despite clashing personalities

keyRelationships.name: Raze
keyRelationships.impact: Shares a love for disruption and aggressive tactics

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Brash and forceful, breaking through enemy defenses
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Led a shock assault to breach a fortified Radianite storage facility

conflicts.name: Stockholm Breakout
conflicts.actionTaken: Used seismic abilities to breach defenses and secure the Radianite

duties: Blinds and dazes enemies to create openings
Disrupts enemy formations with seismic quakes

story.seismicArsenal: Employs seismic energy to shatter defenses and disorient enemies with overwhelming force
story.summary: Breach is a relentless initiator whose seismic powers bulldoze through enemy lines, creating chaos and opportunities for his team.

abilities.name: Trailblazer
abilities.description: EQUIP a Tasmanian tiger trinket. FIRE to send out and control a tiger that you can steer to explode, concussing enemies in a small radius.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: EQUIP a healing trinket. HOLD FIRE to channel, healing allies in range and line of sight. Can be reused until the healing pool is depleted. Does not heal Skye.

abilities.name: Guiding Light
abilities.description: EQUIP a hawk trinket. FIRE to send it forward. HOLD FIRE to guide the hawk, then REUSE to transform it into a flash that blinds enemies looking at it. Can be reused in a round.

abilities.name: Seekers
abilities.description: EQUIP a seeker trinket. FIRE to send out three seekers that track down the closest enemies, nearsighting them if caught.

keyRelationships.name: Sage
keyRelationships.impact: Shares a healing-focused mindset and coordinates team survival

keyRelationships.name: Sova
keyRelationships.impact: Combines tracking skills for effective reconnaissance

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Grounded and team-oriented, guiding allies with natural instincts
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Led a rescue mission in a Radianite-contaminated jungle using her nature abilities

conflicts.name: Outback Crisis
conflicts.actionTaken: Used nature-based abilities to track and neutralize the threat

duties: Blinds and tracks enemies to initiate engagements

story.natureArsenal: Commands nature-infused creatures to scout, heal, and disrupt enemies
story.summary: Skye is a resourceful initiator whose nature-powered abilities heal allies and scout enemies, guiding her team with instinct and strength.

abilities.name: Fakeout
abilities.description: EQUIP an echo that mimics footsteps when activated. FIRE to trigger the echo, creating decoy sounds. ALT FIRE to place the echo for later activation.

abilities.name: Blindside
abilities.description: EQUIP a rift fragment. FIRE to throw the fragment, which bounces off surfaces and detonates into a blinding flash after a short delay.

abilities.name: Gatecrash
abilities.description: EQUIP a rift tether. FIRE to send the tether forward, creating a portal marker. REUSE to teleport to the marker's location. Can be recalled and redeployed.

abilities.name: Dimensional Drift
abilities.description: EQUIP a rift mask. FIRE to drift into a dimension where Yoru is invisible and invulnerable but cannot affect the world. REUSE to exit early.

keyRelationships.name: Phoenix
keyRelationships.impact: Clashes over showmanship but respects each other’s skill

keyRelationships.name: Jett
keyRelationships.impact: Shares a knack for outmaneuvering enemies

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Lone wolf, striking with precision and misdirection
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Infiltrated a heavily guarded Radianite vault using dimensional rifts

conflicts.name: Tokyo Rift
conflicts.actionTaken: Used dimensional abilities to bypass security and recover the artifact

duties: Deceives enemies with fake sounds and portals

story.riftArsenal: Manipulates dimensional rifts to deceive, infiltrate, and outmaneuver enemies
story.summary: Yoru is a cunning duelist whose rift-walking abilities allow him to slip through dimensions, deceiving and striking enemies with deadly precision.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. ACTIVATE a Star to form a Gravity Well. Players in the area are pulled toward the center before it explodes, making all players still trapped inside Vulnerable.

abilities.name: Nova Pulse
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. ACTIVATE a Star to detonate a Nova Pulse. The Nova Pulse charges briefly then strikes, concussing all players in its area.

abilities.name: Nebula / Dissipate
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. ACTIVATE a Star to transform it into a Nebula (smoke). USE a Star to Dissipate it, returning the Star to be placed in a new location after a delay. Dissipate briefly forms a fake Nebula at the Star's location before returning.

abilities.name: Stars
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. ACTIVATE a Star to transform it into a Nebula (smoke). USE a Star to Dissipate it, returning the Star to be placed in a new location after a delay. Dissipate briefly forms a fake Nebula at the Star's location before returning.

abilities.name: Cosmic Divide
abilities.description: ACTIVATE to enter Astral Form where you can place Stars with FIRE. Stars can be reactivated later, transforming them into a Nova Pulse, Nebula, or Gravity Well. When Cosmic Divide is charged, use ALT FIRE in Astral Form to begin aiming it, then FIRE to select two locations. An infinite Cosmic Divide connects the two points you select, blocking bullets and heavily dampening audio.

keyRelationships.name: Harbor
keyRelationships.impact: Shares a connection through their Radiant heritage

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Provides cosmic control to complement Brimstone’s tactics

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Mystical and strategic, manipulating the battlefield from the astral plane
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Halted a Radianite surge by channeling cosmic energy to stabilize a rift

conflicts.name: Accra Rift
conflicts.actionTaken: Used astral abilities to contain and neutralize the rift

duties: Controls space with gravity wells and pulses
Blocks vision and sound with cosmic smokes and walls
Manipulates the battlefield from the astral plane

story.cosmicArsenal: Channels cosmic energy to manipulate gravity, disorient enemies, and reshape the battlefield
story.summary: Astra is a radiant controller who wields cosmic powers to control the battlefield, guiding her team with mystical precision from the astral plane.

abilities.name: FRAG/ment
abilities.description: EQUIP an explosive fragment. FIRE to throw. The fragment sticks to the floor and explodes multiple times, dealing near-lethal damage at the center with each explosion.

abilities.name: FLASH/drive
abilities.description: EQUIP a flash grenade. FIRE to overhand throw. ALT FIRE to lob. The flash grenade explodes after a short fuse, blinding anyone in line of sight.

abilities.name: ZERO/point
abilities.description: EQUIP a suppression blade. FIRE to throw. The blade sticks to the first surface it hits, winds up, and suppresses anyone in the radius of the explosion.

abilities.name: NULL/cmd
abilities.description: INSTANTLY overload with polarized radianite energy that pulses from KAY/O in a massive radius. Enemies hit with pulses are suppressed for a short duration. While overloaded, KAY/O gains Combat Stim and can be re-stabilized if downed.

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Adapts to Brimstone’s leadership despite his machine nature

keyRelationships.name: Reyna
keyRelationships.impact: Opposes Reyna’s Radiant supremacy with his suppression tech

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Calculated and relentless, neutralizing threats with precision
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Disabled a Radiant uprising by suppressing their abilities in a critical skirmish

conflicts.name: Timeline Clash
conflicts.actionTaken: Deployed suppression tech to neutralize Radiant abilities

duties: Blinds and damages foes with grenades
Leads assaults with large-scale suppression pulses

story.cyberArsenal: Utilizes advanced cybernetic technology to suppress, damage, and disrupt enemy forces
story.summary: KAY/O is a relentless war machine from an alternate timeline, designed to neutralize Radiant threats with suppression and firepower, anchoring his team with calculated precision.

abilities.name: Trademark
abilities.description: Place a trap that scans for enemies. When a visible enemy comes in range, the trap counts down and then destabilizes the terrain around them, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

abilities.name: Headhunter
abilities.description: Activate to equip a heavy pistol. Alt fire with the pistol equipped to aim down sights.

abilities.name: Rendezvous
abilities.description: Place two teleport anchors. While on the ground and in range of an anchor, reactivate to teleport to the other anchor. The anchors can be picked up to be redeployed.

abilities.name: Tour de Force
abilities.description: Activate to summon a powerful, custom sniper rifle that will kill any enemy with any direct hit. Killing an enemy creates a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

keyRelationships.name: Cypher
keyRelationships.impact: Trades intel to maintain strategic advantages

keyRelationships.name: Killjoy
keyRelationships.impact: Shares expertise in weapon and trap design

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Suave and calculated, leveraging precision and charm
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Designed a custom defense system to protect a Radianite vault from a coordinated assault

conflicts.name: Paris Gambit
conflicts.actionTaken: Used precision weaponry to dismantle the trafficking ring

story.precisionArsenal: Deploys custom-designed weapons and traps to dominate with unmatched accuracy and style
story.summary: Chamber is a sophisticated sentinel whose precision weaponry and teleportation skills lock down the battlefield with elegance and deadly efficiency.

abilities.name: Fast Lane
abilities.description: FIRE two energy lines forward on the ground that extend a short distance or until they hit a surface. The lines rise into walls of static electricity that block vision.

abilities.name: Relay Bolt
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw an energy bolt that bounces once. Upon hitting each surface, the bolt electrifies the ground below with a concussive blast.

abilities.name: High Gear
abilities.description: INSTANTLY channel Neon's power for increased speed. When charged, ALT FIRE to trigger an electric slide dash. Slide charge resets every two kills.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: Unleash Neon's full power and speed for a short duration. FIRE to channel the power into a deadly lightning beam with high movement accuracy.

keyRelationships.name: Jett
keyRelationships.impact: Bonds over shared speed and cultural ties

keyRelationships.name: Reyna
keyRelationships.impact: Learns aggressive tactics from Reyna’s ruthless style

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Energetic and impulsive, striking with electrifying speed
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Outran and neutralized a Radianite smuggling convoy in Manila

conflicts.name: Manila Surge
conflicts.actionTaken: Used electric speed to intercept and dismantle the convoy

duties: Controls space with damaging energy walls

story.electricArsenal: Harnesses radiant electricity to sprint, stun, and electrify enemies with devastating speed
story.summary: Neon is a lightning-fast duelist whose electric surges and radiant speed overwhelm enemies, electrifying the battlefield with unstoppable energy.

abilities.name: Prowler
abilities.description: EQUIP a prowler. FIRE sends the prowler forward, causing it to lock onto any enemies or trails in its path, and chase them, nearsighting them if it reaches them.

abilities.name: Seize
abilities.description: EQUIP an orb of nightmare ink. FIRE to throw the orb, which will plummet to the ground after a set amount of time. Upon hitting the ground, the ink will explode and create a zone in which enemies caught in it cannot escape by normal means.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: EQUIP a nightmarish entity. FIRE to throw the orb, which will plummet to the ground after a set amount of time. Upon hitting the ground, the orb will turn into a nightmarish entity that reveals the location of enemies caught in its line of sight. Enemies can destroy this entity.

abilities.name: Nightfall
abilities.description: EQUIP the power of fear. FIRE to send out a wave of nightmare energy that can pass through walls. The energy creates a trail to affected enemies and deafens and decays them.

keyRelationships.name: Sova
keyRelationships.impact: Combines nightmare tracking with Sova’s recon for deadly precision

keyRelationships.name: Cypher
keyRelationships.impact: Shares intel-gathering expertise but maintains cautious trust

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Methodical and intimidating, using fear to unravel enemies
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Hunted down a rogue Radiant operative hiding in Istanbul using nightmare abilities

conflicts.name: Istanbul Hunt
conflicts.actionTaken: Tracked and captured the target with fear-based abilities

duties: Disrupts foes with tethers and prowlers
Initiates fights with deafening, revealing ultimates

story.nightmareArsenal: Wields nightmare energy to track, tether, and terrify enemies, exposing their weaknesses
story.summary: Fade is a haunting initiator whose nightmare powers unravel enemy defenses, using fear to track and dominate the battlefield.

abilities.name: Cascade
abilities.description: EQUIP a wave of water. FIRE to send the wave rolling forward and through walls. RE-USE to stop the wave. Players hit are SLOWED.

abilities.name: Cove
abilities.description: EQUIP a sphere of shielding water. FIRE to throw. ALT FIRE to underhand throw. Upon impacting the ground, spawn a water shield that blocks bullets.

abilities.name: High Tide
abilities.description: EQUIP a wall of water. FIRE to send the water forward along the ground. HOLD FIRE to guide the water in the direction of your crosshair, spawning a wall along the water's path. ALT FIRE to stop the water early. Players hit are SLOWED.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description: EQUIP the full power of your Artifact. FIRE to summon a geyser pool on the ground. Enemy players in the area are targeted by successive geyser strikes. Players caught within a strike are CONCUSSED.

keyRelationships.name: Astra
keyRelationships.impact: Shares a connection through their Radiant heritage

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Provides water-based control to support Brimstone’s strategies

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Calm and authoritative, wielding water to shape the battlefield
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Secured an ancient Radianite artifact from a coastal black market

conflicts.name: Mumbai Monsoon
conflicts.actionTaken: Used tidal abilities to block escape routes and recover the artifact

duties: Blocks sightlines with water walls and shields

story.tidalArsenal: Commands ancient water artifacts to shield, slow, and displace enemies with fluid precision
story.summary: Harbor is a commanding controller who wields tidal forces to protect allies and control the battlefield, guiding his team with serene authority.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: EQUIP Mosh. FIRE to throw Mosh like a grenade. Upon landing, Mosh duplicates across a large area and, after a short delay, explodes, dealing damage to enemies within the zone.

abilities.name: Wingman
abilities.description: EQUIP Wingman. FIRE to send Wingman forward seeking enemies. Wingman unleashes a concussive blast toward the first enemy he sees. ALT FIRE when targeting a Spike site or planted Spike to have Wingman defuse or plant the Spike. To plant, Gekko must have the Spike in his inventory.

abilities.name: Dizzy
abilities.description: EQUIP Dizzy. FIRE to send Dizzy soaring forward through the air. Dizzy charges then unleashes plasma blasts at enemies in line of sight. Enemies hit by her plasma are blinded.

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.description: EQUIP Thrash. FIRE to link with Thrash's mind and steer her through enemy territory. ACTIVATE to lunge forward and explode, detaining any players in a small radius.

keyRelationships.name: Phoenix
keyRelationships.impact: Share street culture influences

keyRelationships.name: Reyna
keyRelationships.impact: Combines creature intel with her aggressive style

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Laid-back but determined, commanding his creature companions with care
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Discovered his ability to manifest living creatures from his Radianite energy

conflicts.name: LA Underground
conflicts.actionTaken: Used his creatures to scout and neutralize threat without casualties

story.creatureCompanions: Manifests living creatures from Radianite energy that scout, blind, damage, and detain enemies
story.summary: Gekko leads a tight-knit crew of calamitous creatures. His buddies bound forward, scatter opponents, and reclaim territory with ease. Any enemy standing between Gekko and his crew better watch out.

abilities.name: GravNet
abilities.description: EQUIP a GravNet grenade. FIRE to throw. ALT FIRE to lob. The GravNet detonates upon landing, forcing any enemies caught within to crouch and move slowly.

abilities.name: Sonic Sensor
abilities.description: EQUIP a Sonic Sensor. FIRE to deploy. The sensor monitors an area for enemies making sound. It concusses that area if footsteps, weapons fire, or significant noise are detected.

abilities.name: Barrier Mesh
abilities.description: EQUIP a Barrier Mesh disc. FIRE to throw forward. Upon landing, the disc generates barriers from the origin point that block character movement.

abilities.name: Annihilation
abilities.description: EQUIP a Nanowire Accelerator. FIRE to unleash a pulse of nanowires that captures the first enemy contacted. The cocooned enemy is pulled along a nanowire path and will die if they reach the end, unless they are freed. The nanowire cocoon is destructible.

keyRelationships.name: Brimstone
keyRelationships.impact: Shares tactical military background

keyRelationships.name: Sage
keyRelationships.impact: Both specialize in area denial through different means

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Strict, disciplined, with unwavering focus on mission security
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Successfully defended a high-value Radianite shipment from coordinated attacks

conflicts.name: Oslo Incursion
conflicts.actionTaken: Deployed barrier technology to secure perimeter and captured infiltrators

story.nanowireSystems: Deploys advanced nanowire technology to create barriers, slow enemies, and capture intruders
story.summary: Deadlock deploys an array of cutting-edge nanowire to secure the battlefield from enemy incursion. No one escapes her vigilant watch or the strike of her unyielding swift justice.

abilities.name: Contingency
abilities.description: EQUIP to assemble prismatic energy. FIRE to push an indestructible wall of energy forward that blocks bullets.

abilities.name: Undercut
abilities.description: EQUIP a molecular bolt. FIRE to throw it forward, applying a brief FRAGILE to all players it touches. The bolt can pass through solid objects, including walls.

abilities.name: Double Tap
abilities.description: START a focus timer. Once completed, enter a flow state during which downed enemies you kill or damage generate an energy orb. Shooting this orb grants you a shield which absorbs one instance of damage from any source.

abilities.name: Kill Contract
abilities.description: EQUIP an interdimensional arena. FIRE to hurl a column of energy through the battlefield, pulling you and the first enemy hit into the arena. You and your opponent duel to the death.

keyRelationships.name: Jett
keyRelationships.impact: Both demonstrate exceptional reflexes and finesse

keyRelationships.name: Phoenix
keyRelationships.impact: Complementary aggressive playstyles

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Independent and confident, leading by example through skill and prowess
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Won a prestigious underground fighting tournament using his Radiant abilities

conflicts.name: Shanghai Showdown
conflicts.actionTaken: Single-handedly neutralized multiple opponents using energy manipulation

story.energyManipulation: Channels and redirects energy in combat for attacks, defense, and tactical advantage
story.summary: Iso steps into the fight on his own terms, charging headlong into danger with unmatched confidence. He punishes enemies with a barrage of energy and quickly eliminates any who stand against him.

abilities.name: Pick-Me-Up
abilities.description: INSTANTLY absorb the life force of a fallen enemy that Clove damaged or killed, gaining haste and temporary health.

abilities.name: Meddle
abilities.description: EQUIP a fragment of immortality essence. FIRE to throw the fragment, which erupts after a short delay and temporarily decays all targets caught inside.

abilities.name: Ruse
abilities.description: EQUIP to view the battlefield. FIRE to set the locations where Clove’s clouds will settle. ALT FIRE to confirm, launching clouds that block vision in the chosen areas. Clove can use this ability after death.

abilities.name: Not Dead Yet
abilities.description: After dying, ACTIVATE to resurrect. Once resurrected, Clove must earn a kill or a damaging assist within a set time or they will die. REACTIVATE to cancel early.

keyRelationships.name: Omen
keyRelationships.impact: Both manipulate different dimensional aspects

keyRelationships.name: Astra
keyRelationships.impact: Together can manipulate both space and time

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Chaotic but effective, bending rules of mortality and time
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Survived what should have been a fatal laboratory accident by manipulating their own timeline

conflicts.name: Edinburgh Anomaly
conflicts.actionTaken: Utilized temporal abilities to stabilize and contain the anomaly

story.temporalMastery: Manipulates the boundary between life and death, stepping between dimensions to gain tactical advantage
story.summary: Clove flows through the battlefield with chaotic precision, defying death itself while manipulating the space around them. With gravitational control and stimulating support, they ensure their team maintains the upper hand.

abilities.name: Razorvine
abilities.description: EQUIP a nest of liquid metal. FIRE to launch. Upon landing, the nest becomes invisible. When activated, it expands into razorvine, slowing and damaging enemies who pass through.

abilities.name: Arc Rose
abilities.description: EQUIP an Arc Rose. FIRE to place a stealthed Arc Rose on a surface. REUSE to blind all players looking at it. The Arc Rose can be picked up and redeployed.

abilities.name: Shear
abilities.description: EQUIP filaments of liquid metal. FIRE to place a hidden wall trap. When an enemy crosses, an indestructible wall bursts from the ground behind them, blocking their retreat.

abilities.name: Steel Garden
abilities.description: EQUIP a device that, upon activation, creates a large area of razorvine, severely damaging and slowing enemies within. The area persists for a duration, controlling space effectively.

keyRelationships.name: Killjoy
keyRelationships.impact: Competing approaches to security technology

keyRelationships.name: Cypher
keyRelationships.impact: Share surveillance methods and intel

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Methodical and analytical, securing areas through digital and physical means
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Prevented a catastrophic data breach in Kingdom's Radianite research database

conflicts.name: Seoul Digital Siege
conflicts.actionTaken: Deployed countermeasures to neutralize network attacks while protecting critical infrastructure

story.digitalArsenal: Combines cutting-edge technology with Radianite-enhanced digital systems to control and secure battlefields
story.summary: Vyse fortifies the battlefield with adaptive technological barriers while disrupting enemy systems. With an arsenal of digital countermeasures, she ensures no opponent's abilities go unchecked.

abilities.name: Guided Salvo
abilities.description: EQUIP an AR targeting system. FIRE to select up to two target locations on the map. ALT FIRE to launch missiles that autonomously navigate to target locations, detonating on arrival.

abilities.name: Stealth Drone
abilities.description: EQUIP a stealth drone. FIRE to deploy the drone forward and assume direct control of its movement. FIRE again to trigger a pulse that suppresses and reveals enemies hit.

abilities.name: Special Delivery
abilities.description: EQUIP a sticky grenade. FIRE to launch it; the grenade sticks to the first surface it hits and explodes, concussing any targets caught in the blast. ALT FIRE to launch the grenade with a single bounce.

abilities.name: Armageddon
abilities.description: EQUIP a tactical strike targeting map. FIRE to select the origin point of the strike. FIRE again to set the end point and launch the attack, unleashing a wave of explosions along the strike path.

keyRelationships.name: Waylay
keyRelationships.impact: Recruited Waylay to the VALORANT Protocol

keyRelationships.name: Killjoy
keyRelationships.impact: Shares expertise in advanced weaponry and drone tech

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Bold and tactical, overwhelming enemies with advanced tech
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Led an assault to secure a Radianite facility using precision missile strikes

conflicts.name: Bogotá Blitz
conflicts.actionTaken: Deployed drones and missiles to neutralize the threat and secure the facility

duties: Controls areas with guided missile strikes
Gathers intel and suppresses enemies with stealth drones
Disrupts enemy positions with concussive grenades

story.missileArsenal: Deploys advanced missile and drone technology to dominate and disrupt enemies with precision
story.summary: Tejo is a tech-savvy duelist from Colombia whose missile-based arsenal and stealth drones overwhelm enemies, securing sites with explosive precision and tactical flair.

abilities.name: Saturate
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw a cluster of light that explodes upon contact with the ground, HINDERING nearby players with a powerful movement and weapon slow.

abilities.name: Light Speed
abilities.description: EQUIP to prepare for a burst of speed. FIRE to dash forward twice, with the first dash able to go upward. ALT FIRE to dash once. Only the first dash can send you upward.

abilities.name: Refract
abilities.description: INSTANTLY create a beacon of light on the floor. REACTIVATE to speed back to the beacon as a mote of pure light, becoming invulnerable during travel.

abilities.name: Convergent Paths
abilities.description: EQUIP to focus your prismatic power. FIRE to create an afterimage that projects a beam of light. After a brief delay, gain a speed boost as the beam expands, HINDERING enemies with movement and weapon slow.

keyRelationships.name: Tejo
keyRelationships.impact: Recruited Waylay to the VALORANT Protocol

keyRelationships.name: Phoenix
keyRelationships.impact: Guides Phoenix’s emotional and tactical growth

valiantProtocol.leadershipStyle: Strict yet caring, mentoring younger agents with tactical discipline
valiantProtocol.notableEvent: Reinforced a VALORANT Protocol mission in Bangkok, securing a critical site

conflicts.name: Bangkok Breach
conflicts.actionTaken: Used light-based abilities to outmaneuver and disrupt enemy forces

duties: Secures sites with rapid dashes and hindering debuffs

story.prismaticArsenal: Transforms into light to dash, disrupt, and hinder enemies with prismatic energy
story.summary: Waylay is a radiant duelist from Thailand whose light-based abilities and high mobility allow her to dominate sites and mentor her team, striking with precision and escaping in a flash.
